altername_name: LEGO Star Wars II: Die klassische Trilogie
name: LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy
overview: Lego Star Wars II is based on A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. The game comically retells the trilogy's events using cut scenes without dialogue. The player assumes the roles of the films' characters, each of which possess specific weapons and abilities. At any time, a second player can join the game by activating a second controller.
